prompts.seedanceVideo: Create a child-safe educational lesson video for subject "Exam Prep" and lesson "A-Level: A-Level Standards and Targets". Target audience: pre-K through grade 12 adaptable, inclusive global classroom representation. Structure: 3 acts (hook, explained concept, recap) with simple visual storytelling and no on-screen brand logos. Camera: gentle motion, medium framing, occasional close-ups on key concept visuals. Duration: 35-55 seconds. Aspect: 16:9. FPS: 24. Safety constraints: no violence, no fear-based scenes, no stereotypes, no copyrighted characters. Accessibility constraints: high contrast objects, slower transitions, clean backgrounds, low visual clutter. Core concept focus: A-Level: A-Level Standards and Targets. End frame: celebratory but calm transition inviting learner to continue to quiz/activity.
prompts.seedanceAnimation: Generate a short concept animation for "Exam Prep" lesson "A-Level: A-Level Standards and Targets". Length: 8-12 seconds, seamless loop. No text overlays required; visual metaphor must be understandable for young learners. Include one mascot-neutral guiding shape to direct attention. Output: classroom-safe, no logos, no copyrighted references, no sensitive content.
